decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoNormal">All new external and internal works and finishes and works
of making good to the retained fabric shall match the existing adjacent work
with regard to the methods used and materials, colour, texture and profile,
unless shown otherwise on the drawings or other documentation hereby approved
or required by any conditions(s) attached to this consent.<br>
REASON: To protect the special architectural or historic interest of the listed
building<o:p></o:p></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: 7px;">Historic fabric that is affected
by the removal of the temporary handrail shall be made good like for like
before the installation of the replacement handrail hereby approved.<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:
0cm;margin-left:49.65pt;mso-add-space:auto;text-indent:-49.65pt;line-height:
normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:54.0pt 288.0pt;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none">

</p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-left: 7px;">REASON: To protect the special
architectural or historic interest of the listed building.<o:p></o:p></p>
description: Listed Building Consent: Installation of a handrail to the Rhodes House entrance.
